CSS_counter-styleAdditive-symbols.summary: The additive-symbols descriptor of the '@counter-style' at-rule is used to specify counter symbols when the _counter-style '@counter-style/system' descriptor value is set as additive. The additive system is used to construct sign-value numbering systems such as Roman numerals.
